text:
Had to pick the tomato & egg grilled fish as I have a Lil sore throat and surprisingly it's very good! Can't even imagine how good is the mala flavour fish and malaxiangguo. Will be back once I got better.
Remember to Google review for a free drinks

Very good China food in Yishun. Their grilled fish is superb as well as value for money. Repeated visits for me and my family and kept coming back. Good service and good ambience too.  Highly recommend for China food cravings in the north.
Quite big portion, prices are subjected to service and gst charges but still consider cheap. Highly recommended to try their grilled fish üëçüèª

Food was good. Service was fast. Limited seating. We spent $45 for 2 pax. Left the place feeling full.

There is service charge 10% and GST 9%

Ordered the bigger portion of grilled fish as we were hungry and it came with 2 fishes which was quite a lot. It would have been great if the service staff advised us against it. There was quite little soup as well, which was a pity as the soup was nice to drink albeit oily, which is pretty normal. Service staff were friendly and offered us the private room, although a bit cold. The century egg tofu was had a refreshing taste. Dumpling skin was a bit thick and wouldn't recommend. Overall still a pleasant experience.

Update 15.09.2026
Service still as great

Update 09.01.2025
Tried the black fungus side dish today as well - worth ordering! Service still great :)
